content.question: Which of the following combinations of physical changes to a solenoid would definitely cause an increase in its inductance?

choices.label: Decreasing the number of turns per unit length and increasing the cross-sectional area of the solenoid
Increasing the total number of turns and the length of the solenoid
Decreasing the length and increasing the number of turns per unit length of the solenoid
Increasing the cross-sectional area and decreasing the length of the solenoid

content.answer: Increasing the cross-sectional area and decreasing the length of the solenoid

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
